title: Medication
description: Indicates that a medication product is to be or has been dispensed for a named person/patient.(Based on HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

fhir:identifier.title: Identifier
fhir:identifier.description: Identifiers associated with this medication Dispense that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate.

fhir:basedOn.title: Based On
fhir:basedOn.description: A plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this MedicationDispense.

fhir:partOf.title: Part Of
fhir:partOf.description: The procedure or medication administration that triggered the dispense.

fhir:status.title: Status
fhir:status.description: preparation | in-progress | cancelled | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | declined | unknown

fhir:notPerformedReason.title: Not Performed Reason
fhir:notPerformedReason.description: Indicates the reason why a dispense was not performed.

fhir:statusChanged.title: Status Changed
fhir:statusChanged.description: The date (and maybe time) when the status of the dispense record changed.

fhir:category.title: Category
fhir:category.description: Indicates the type of medication dispense (for example, drug classification like ATC, where meds would be administered, legal category of the medication.).

fhir:medication.title: Medication
fhir:medication.description: Identifies the medication being requested. This is a link to a resource that represents the medication which may be the details of the medication or simply an attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.

fhir:subject.title: Subject
fhir:subject.description: A link to a resource representing the person or the group to whom the medication will be given.

fhir:encounter.title: Encounter
fhir:encounter.description: The encounter that establishes the context for this event.

fhir:supportingInformation.title: Supporting Information
fhir:supportingInformation.description: Additional information that supports the medication being dispensed. For example, there may be requirements that a specific lab test has been completed prior to dispensing or the patient's weight at the time of dispensing is documented.

fhir:performer.title: Performer
fhir:performer.description: Indicates who or what performed the event.

xdm:function.title: Function
xdm:function.description: Distinguishes the type of performer in the dispense. For example, date enterer, packager, final checker.

xdm:actor.title: Actor
xdm:actor.description: The device, practitioner, etc. who performed the action. It should be assumed that the actor is the dispenser of the medication.

fhir:location.title: Location
fhir:location.description: The principal physical location where the dispense was performed.

fhir:authorizingPrescription.title: Authorizing Prescription
fhir:authorizingPrescription.description: Indicates the medication order that is being dispensed against.

fhir:type.title: Type
fhir:type.description: Indicates the type of dispensing event that is performed. For example, Trial Fill, Completion of Trial, Partial Fill, Emergency Fill, Samples, etc.

fhir:quantity.title: quantity
fhir:quantity.description: The amount of medication that has been dispensed. Includes unit of measure.

fhir:daysSupply.title: Days Supply
fhir:daysSupply.description: The amount of medication expressed as a timing amount.

fhir:recorded.title: Recorded
fhir:recorded.description: The date (and maybe time) when the dispense activity started if whenPrepared or whenHandedOver is not populated.

fhir:whenPrepared.title: When Prepared
fhir:whenPrepared.description: The time when the dispensed product was packaged and reviewed.

fhir:whenHandedOver.title: When Handed Over
fhir:whenHandedOver.description: The time the dispensed product was provided to the patient or their representative.

fhir:destination.title: Destination
fhir:destination.description: Identification of the facility/location where the medication was/will be shipped to, as part of the dispense event.

fhir:receiver.title: Receiver
fhir:receiver.description: Identifies the person who picked up the medication or the location of where the medication was delivered. This will usually be a patient or their caregiver, but some cases exist where it can be a healthcare professional or a location.

fhir:note.title: Note
fhir:note.description: Extra information about the dispense that could not be conveyed in the other attributes.

fhir:renderedDosageInstruction.title: Rendered Dosage Instruction
fhir:renderedDosageInstruction.description: The full representation of the dose of the medication included in all dosage instructions. To be used when multiple dosage instructions are included to represent complex dosing such as increasing or tapering doses.

fhir:dosageInstruction.title: Dosage Instruction
fhir:dosageInstruction.description: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.

fhir:substitution.title: Substitution
fhir:substitution.description: Indicates whether or not substitution was made as part of the dispense.

xdm:wasSubstituted.title: Was Substituted
xdm:wasSubstituted.description: True if the dispenser dispensed a different drug or product from what was prescribed.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: A code signifying whether a different drug was dispensed from what was prescribed.

xdm:reason.title: Reason
xdm:reason.description: Indicates the reason for the substitution, or why substitution must or must not be performed.

xdm:responsibleParty.title: Responsible Party
xdm:responsibleParty.description: The person or organization that has primary responsibility for the substitution.

fhir:eventHistory.title: Event History
fhir:eventHistory.description: A summary of the events of interest that have occurred, such as when the dispense was verified.
